review: AppleTV is a fabulous little device (and I do mean tiny -- about the size of two decks of playing cards!). We love the PBS app most of all; so nice to be able to watch our favorite shows after they air instead of having to be home at a certain time to watch them live. We've also been very pleased with the extra content PBS offers through the app on this device. Having AppleTV has also inspired us to subscribe to Netflix for the first time ever; accessing movies, documentaries, and tv shows is a snap via AppleTV. My husband is in his 70s and has become increasingly technically challenged, yet he mastered how to use the AppleTV (and how to toggle back and forth between it and our cable service) within a week. Yay! Now he is primarily watching content via AppleTV, so I'm hoping to disconnect our cable service altogether. Double yay!! AppleTV is a stellar product and we are continuously pleased with this purchase; we highly, highly recommend it. (AND, YES, THIS VERSION DOES INDEED COME WITH A REMOTE!)
